title: Day 114 (Psalm 43-45, 49, 84-85, 87) - Year 3

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- Deuteronoy 8:17-18

- Article: Why the Psalms Are Written "For the Choir Director"

- Exodus 34:6-7

- Trips to Israel!
